body.name: Newton Baby Crib Mattress and Toddler Bed - 100% Breathable Proven to Reduce Suffocation Risk, 100% Washable, 2-Stage, Non-Toxic Better Than Organic, Removable Cover - Deluxe 5.5" Thick- White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 19 hrs 4 mins
features: BETTER SLEEP FOR YOUR LITTLE ONES: We believe that a good mattress can make all the difference for a good night's sleep, especially for babies. Newton baby crib mattresses are made with quality, protection, and comfort in mind. Our simple focus is on your baby, and with features like breathable and gentle bedding, they'll get a safer night’s sleep, so they'll feel more rested and ready to play.

100% BREATHABLE: With innovative breathe-thru technology, our baby + toddler mattress allows your baby to breathe right through. The patented, supportive core is encased in a soft, detachable cover. The proprietary core of our toddler mattress is made up of 90% air and 10% yoghurt-cup material. Because of its airy construction, it is extremely breathable and delivers a safer sleep surface for your baby's well-being.

100% WASHABLE: The only crib mattress that’s washable from the cover to the core! With a unique design and construction, our washable crib mattress is made from quality materials that fit most standard-size cribs and doesn't have any foam, glue, latex, or springs that could be harmful over time. Safe and gentle to the skin of your babies, it will help them sleep comfortably. Our baby + toddler bed mattress is also super easy to clean, so you can use it for many years.

INFANT & TODDLER (2-STAGE): Crib mattresses can be a little convoluted, with all sorts of bells and whistles. But one thing is quite simple: your baby’s safety. Our crib mattress is designed with extra layers of comfort and support to help maintain baby's natural posture. Your baby's needs will change as he grows, and our crib mattresses help your baby through all stages of development.

MADE BY PARENTS FOR PARENTS: As parents ourselves, we understand. We know that your baby’s safety comes first, and we also know how much you want to give them the right start in life. As experts in the area of sleep, we know just how important good sleep is for both of you. That's why we've devoted our time and expertise to creating a crib mattress, crib-sized sheets and covers, crib and twin-sized mattress pads, and extra covers that are not only safer but also more comfortable.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The 100% Breathable and Washable Crib Mattress Looking for a crib mattress that is both safe and comfortable for your little one? Look no further than the Newton Baby Crib Mattress! With breathable technology and an innovative Wovenaire core, our mattress is designed to keep your baby safe and comfortable throughout the night.

Breathe-Thru Technology for Safe Sleep Our crib mattress has undergone thorough independent testing to craft a design that significantly reduces the risk of suffocation. We deeply understand the importance of your baby's well-being, which drives us to go the extra mile in providing a mattress that ensures both comfort and peace of mind. The Safe Haven for Your Baby's Sleep We believe a good mattress can make all the difference for a better night’s sleep, especially for babies. That’s why we’re proud to bring peace of mind to parents and help little ones sleep safe and sound. Choose Newton Baby crib mattresses for the ultimate combination of safety and comfort. Easy to Clean and Maintain A natural, chemical-free approach for exceeding rigorous federal flammability standards. Fully breathable and machine washable. Peaceful Sleep for Your Little One Our breathable mattress provides optimal levels of comfort, support and air circulation, ensuring that your baby will sleep better on a Newton. 100% Washable for a Healthier Sleep Environment The only crib mattress that's washable from cover to core. NO foam, glue, latex or springs, so your baby will enjoy a cleaner, hypoallergenic sleep.

The Safest, Most Comfortable Choice for Your Baby's Sleep Our baby + toddler mattress features a Wovenaire core that allows your baby to breathe right through it. Our unique core is encased in a dual-layer, detachable, machine-washable cover with a waterproof lining on one side for the toddler years. 1 2 3

Is your baby mattress organic? While the Newton Crib Mattress is not organic, it is a safer crib mattress for baby. It is not only completely breathable to reduce suffocation risk but also the only washable crib mattress making it the most hygienic sleep surface for your baby. Why buy a breathable mattress for baby? A breathable and washable crib mattress not only helps to reduce the risk of suffocation but also helps to reduce the baby's body temperature. This allows babies to sleep more comfortably and longer through the night. What is the crib mattress size? Standard crib mattress sizes are regulated to meet a minimum sizing of 27 1/4" x 51 5/8" and not thicker than 6 inches. If a crib is labeled as a standard crib, Newton Crib Mattresses will fit nice and snuggly inside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Peace of Mind
reviews.reviewText: ***UPDATE***My daughter ended up using this for two years. It never sagged or got an indentation. It was so easy to clean and air dry. I only stopped using it when my daughter got too tall for a crib and I got her a twin bed.Another bonus - since this is such a high quality mattress, you can sell it when you're done. I sold mine at a local consignment sale for $50 after two years of use - so happy I got this and if I had another baby I'd buy a new one to bring them home from the hospital to.I never put any sheet or anything on it. I highly recommend HALO sleep sacks for babies and toddlers. No need for any sheets or blankets on the bed.***ORIGINAL REVIEW BELOW***When my daughter was around 6 months old and learned to roll over, my husband and I were scared half to death to frequently find her face down, hands cupping her cheeks, during her naps. We would immediately turn her head to the side and a couple times she gasped for air when we did. Some people tried to assure me that, once babies can roll over, there's nothing to worry about when they sleep since they'll automatically turn their heads when they need air. However, after looking into it, I found research that babies who are used to sleeping on their backs, once they finally roll over and sleep on their stomachs for the first time, have a 20% or so higher chance of suffocating than infants who sleep on their stomachs from birth, because they aren't used to it and sometimes don't rouse themselves in time.We weren't able to sleep without constantly checking on her. I researched options and found the Newton breathable crib mattress. After reading everything on their website, I decided it was the one. It doesn't off-gas, it doesn't have chemicals, it's mostly air. We ordered it on Prime instead of from their website directly to get faster shipping. Once it arrived my husband and I, like others here, tested it by pressing our faces down against it and trying to breathe - it is a bit stuffy, of course, but you can breathe. And it doesn't smell like anything. No need to air it out before baby uses it.It is more firm than our "firm" crib mattress we were using previously. Our daughter doesn't leave any indent in it at all. It looks incredibly easy to clean; just use some cold water. It's some kind of polymer in a 3-D web. The cover is padded but has holes and layers so that it doesn't block air. Don't put any sheet or water-proof cover on this mattress, as that would block the air. It really doesn't need those things, since even if pee leaked or spit up got on it you just wash it off. It has nothing that could get moldy like other mattresses.Of course, we don't want to teach our daughter that it's okay to sleep with her face down, so if we find her like that, we do turn her head. But now we aren't constantly worried about her suffocating if we happen to not notice her being face down. For peace of mind, I highly recommend this mattress. We're going to move our daughter back to her original mattress once she's a toddler and save this one for when we have the next baby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS MATTRESS!
reviews.reviewText: Update: We have had this mattress for almost 2 years now, with continuous everyday use and at least 1-2 times a week of washing the cover. We still have the original cover from when we first purchased it- it's holding up great. Oxy Clean spray has taken out any yellowing from little nighttime accidents before I washed it. The inner core is doing well too!My son absolutely loves his mattress- he is almost 2 and has 3-4 hour long naps on it and 12 hours at night. On vacations it's a little rough because we can't take it with us- he doesn't sleep as good and it's really hard to get him to sleep without it (using a pack n'play mattress). If only Newton could make one for the pack n' play for travel!!My son also sleeps facedown.. literally.. and it's so nice to know he can BREATHE right through the mattress. So nice and reassuring for this worrisome momma!Original post:I love this mattress. Seriously, you cannot go wrong buying this mattress. Best Baby purchase we've made so far.Pros:1) Washable. Yes, WASHABLE!! Every single aspect of this mattress can be washed and cleaned. Pee on the mattress? No big deal, just zip off the mattress pad and throw it in the wash. The actual mattress part is a giant entanglement of biodegradable, safe plastic. When I first got the mattress in the mail, I soaked in the bathtub with some tea tree oil and then air dried it outside. Super easy.2) Made with quality materials. My baby sleeps on a mattress 8 hrs a day, so 1/3 of his time is on the mattress. I wanted something that wassafe (no fire retardants or PVC materials).3) Breathable. According to the website through their independent study (I understand this isn't maybe as factual as a 3rd party study, but still valid) they have found a way to significantly decrease the risk of SIDS death. This is immensely comforting as a first-time mom knowing that if my baby rolls over in the middle of the night, he can't suffocate while sleeping.Cons:1) Not cheap. This was a relatively expensive mattress. We tried to justify it by the pros and that he can use it in a toddler bed as well.All in all, LOVE THIS MATTRESS!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE HYPE IS REAL
reviews.reviewText: LONG but honest & non sponsored review!!I was nervous about spending so much on a mattress especially when the videos I was watching on TikTok were all from people that are sponsored by newton. My 9 month old has been bed sharing with us since she was born & as safe as we are.. it has ALWAYS freaked me out.. but I’m a breastfeeding mama & my daughter feeds often in the middle of the night or she’ll wake up & cry for hours. SO we had to do what was best for us at the time! As she’s gotten bigger, our bed seems to have gotten smaller lol I knew that I needed to make a change but wasn’t ready to put her in her own crib in her room, & bassinets didn’t work because she wasn’t touching me & would again, wake up. We decided to do a car side crib but she’s sleeping face down a lot & I have to turn her over constantly. I wanted something I could breathe straight through & not wake up every 5 seconds to check on her. I did a ton of research & everything kept leading me back to this mattress so I went for it & booooooy am I SO GLAD I DID!!! The hype is V E R Y real!!! I’m so pleased with it & think it’s worth every single penny. It’s super easy to clean too!! I also highly recommend newton sheets 🩷 very soft & super breathable!

reviews.reviewTitle: Best purchase I could have made for my baby
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this mattress, not only does it give me a peace of mind for my baby's health and safety. It's also super easy to keep clean. I saw a review on here that says it doesn't actually fit standard sheets, and that's just an outright lie. It's fit every sheet I've put on it with our very standard crib, including flannel. It's firm enough to give babies the support they need to grow bone and muscle density but are soft enough for them to sleep comfortably.
Perfect mattress for a newborn. Breathable mattress and safe for bub
A little pricier than other mattresses but so well worth it. The breathable material is fantastic and comfortable. Would recommended to buy the separate mattress protector was well.

I think that it’s washable and breathable. I was cosleeping and the baby transitioned and slept in this with no issue from the first night. He seems comfortable and since he became a stomach sleeper at 6 months I am not as concerned letting him sleep on his tummy with this mattress since it’s breathable.I’m using the Burt bees organic crib sheets on it and they fit great.It’s also light so not the biggest deal that I have to lift each edge above bumper pads to change sheets. I would recommend this mattress , it took me a long time to figure out what to buy and I’m happy that I went with a cheaper crib and a more expensive mattress.***update***My son is now 20 months old and this mattress is still fantastic. He turned into the biggest vomit machine and being able to zip the mattress cover off throw it into the wash has been everything! I can literally hose down the mattress too when needed. He can get really warm when sleeping and I can feel that he sleeps cooler on this compared to his baby bjorn travel crib when we travel. $400 is a lot but when I look back at some of the money I wasted on baby items this still remains a smart purchase. And since I’m determined to never let him cosleep with me again , there have been some nights I have gotten into this crib to settle him down and fell asleep and I even found it comfortable!
Baby sleeps better after using it.
